comment: I took estimating 1 3410 (there was no option for this class). He was assigned this class 3 days before the summer semester began. Professor Peeples did an ok job handling assignments. He is a middle of the road professor. Not too difficult, Not neccessarily easy. He is understanding and accessible out of class. Lectures are extremely boring.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lecture heavy--Accessible outside class

comment: He is a nice professor and will work with you if need help. His assignments are a bit confusing and he often confuses himself while trying to explain the class and homework. Again, really nice teacher but I would not recommend him if this class is for a credit. Attendance matters and there is random pop quizzes that are easy.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Participation matters--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Professor is very condescending in emails and grades off a very unclear scope with the slightest difference in answers completely negating any points. Easy class, but professor could be better.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: Peeples is a very chill professor. I would literally recommend taking him if possible. He is very lecture heavy, and it can be boring. He does have some pop quizzes, but they're mostly done to take attendance. Pop quizzes are also very random!! I had no trouble with him & overall a great professor!!
pretty funny guy, long boring lectures, somewhat easy assignments but difficult exams
Easiest professor ever. His lectures are the most boring thing ever, but everything is online. he does give pop quizzes. Highly recommend.
I took Professor Peeples for CM 3270. He's a cool professor and lectures contain useful information for the real world. As long as you are consistent with completing assignments you will pass.

Honestly just not much of an original teacher, he copies all his homework from amaal and literally just posts her videos to explain a subject. he just is not a good teacher at all. Does not explain anything well at all and if you ask a question it makes you feel stupid.
